data.title: The George Washington University
data.meta_description: The George Washington University graduates thousands of exceptional students every year who go on to change the world.
data.text:
The university recognizes and celebrates the accomplishments of our alumni through various awards.

Spirit of GW Awards

The Spirit of GW Awards, formerly the GW Alumni Achievement Awards, recognizes the contributions and achievements of GW alumni and friends in each of the following categories:

Nominations for the 2024 Spirit of GW Awards are now closed.

Note: Nominations are solicited from within the university community from the Division of Development & Alumni Relations (DAR), university leadership, and GW faculty and staff. Recommendations are shared with the Vice President for Development and Alumni Relations and the DAR Executive Leadership Council for final approval.

For additional information, contact Karen S. White at alumni@gwu.edu.

Spirit of GW Awards past recipients

2022 (Read story)

Distinguished Alumni Achievement Award

GW Award for Philanthropy

Alumni Outstanding Service Award

Recent Alumni Achievement Award

Alumni Outstanding Service Award – Barbara Ann Fleming, CCAS BS ’81, SEAS MS ‘85

Recent Alumni Achievement Award – Sally A. Nuamah, CCAS BA ‘11
